sorular.soru: What is the speed limit after this sign?

feedback.metin: This sign indicates the start of an autoweg. The speed limit here is 100 km/h, unless signage indicates otherwise. In built-up areas, the speed limit on autowegen is 50 km/h.

sorular.soru: What is the minimum following distance?

feedback.metin: Under normal road and weather conditions, you must maintain a minimum following distance of two seconds. Maintaining this distance means that you will pass any given point two seconds later than the vehicle in front of you.
